vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to look at or to, regard, gaze at or about
1a) (Qal) to gaze at, regard, behold, look about
1b) (Hiphil) to look away, cause gaze to turn away
1c) (Hithpael) to look in dismay, gaze about (in anxiety)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   mirar; (b) hitp.   mirar fijamente, observar; (c) hif.   mirar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 凝視
1a) (Qal) 凝視, 注重, 看, 四下環顧
1b) (Hiphil) 將凝視的目光轉移 (詩 39:13)
1c) (Hithpael) 凝視 (帶著焦慮) (賽 41:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 凝视
1a) (Qal) 凝视, 注重, 看, 四下环顾
1b) (Hiphil) 将凝视的目光转移 (诗 39:13)
1c) (Hithpael) 凝视 (带着焦虑) (赛 41:10)
